full_summary:
### Compressor Solicitation for the National Research Council Canada
#### Reference Information
* Solicitation Number: 23-58087 (Version B)
* Date Published: January 4, 2024
* Closing Date: February 7, 2024, 14:00:00

#### Contract Requirements
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is soliciting bids for the supply and delivery of a hydrogen/helium booster compressor. The necessary specifications for this project include:
* A 200 psig inlet gas supply of either hydrogen or helium
* Boosting the pressure at the outlet to 6,000 psig
* The compressor will be used for research and development purposes at the NRC's headquarters in British Columbia

#### Tender Details
* Amendment Number: 10
* Tender Status: Expired
* Bidder Information: 
  * End users of the compressor: None specified
  * Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
  * Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Req. for Prop.)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: British Columbia
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia
* Contracting Entity: National Research Council Canada
  * Contact Information: 
    * Name: Kacendra Dion
    * Email: Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca
    * Phone: (438) 324-8125
* Relevant Attachments:
  * [Solicitation Notice: English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28667/23-58087-version-b_npp_en_compressor.pdf)
  * [Solicitation Notice: French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28667/23-58087-version-b_fr_rfp_compresseur-et-surpression-a-lhydrogene-et-lhelium.pdf)
  * [Request for Proposal: English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28667/23-58087-version-b_en_rfp_hydrogen-helium-booster-compressor.pdf)
  * [Request for Proposal: French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28667/23-58087-version-b_fr_rfp_compresseur-et-surpression-a-lhydro
